original_title: 新・女囚さそり 特殊房X
overview: A nurse is framed for her involvement in the hospital murder of a politician who was threatening to expose corrupt practices. She escapes from jail but is captured and sent back, resulting in the rest of the inmates being punished, added to which of a new, tougher, head of security arrives to take up her new job....
title: New Female Prisoner Scorpion: Special Cellblock X
